# Regressions & Table Generation {#sec-regressions}

This chapter documents the estimation-to-table pipeline.

## Architecture

```
code/{{07_regressions.do}}  →  output/results/regression_results.csv
code/{{08_tables.do}}       →  $OL/files/tab/{{subfolder}}/*.tex
```

## Specification

All regressions use a common TWFE specification (see @sec-empirical-strategy):

```stata
reghdfe outcome treatment [controls], absorb(unit_fe year) vce(cluster cluster_var)
```
